mapper.select:
SELECT twhc.ID, twhc.CompanyID, twhc.Platform, twhc.ProjectID, twhc.MonitorType, twhc.MonitorItemID, twhc.CompareMode, twhc.SensorID, twhc.FieldID, twhc.`Enable`, twhc.WarnName, twhc.`Value`, twhc.ExValue, tpi.ProjectName projectName, tpi.ShortName projectShortName, ts.Alias sensorName, tmp.`Name` monitorPointName, tmtf.FieldName fieldName, tdu.EngUnit fieldUnitEng FROM `tb_warn_threshold_config` twhc LEFT JOIN tb_project_info tpi ON twhc.ProjectID = tpi.ID LEFT JOIN tb_sensor ts ON twhc.SensorID = ts.ID LEFT JOIN tb_monitor_point tmp ON tmp.ID = ts.MonitorPointID LEFT JOIN tb_monitor_type_field tmtf ON twhc.FieldID = tmtf.ID LEFT JOIN tb_data_unit tdu ON tmtf.FieldUnitID = tdu.ID
twhc.ID = #{id}

SELECT mi.`ID` itemID, mi.`Name` itemName, mi.`Alias` itemAlias, mi.`Enable` enable, mt.`MonitorType` monitorType, mt.`TypeName` typeName, mt.`TypeAlias` typeAlias, mt.`CreateType` createType, mi.`MonitorClass` monitorClass, COUNT(wtc.`ID`) configCount FROM tb_monitor_item mi LEFT JOIN tb_monitor_type mt ON mt.`MonitorType` = mi.`MonitorType` LEFT JOIN tb_warn_threshold_config wtc ON wtc.`MonitorItemID` = mi.`ID` AND wtc.`Enable` IS TRUE AND wtc.Platform=#{platform} WHERE mi.`ProjectID`=#{projectID} GROUP BY mi.`ID`

SELECT wtc.WarnName warnName, pi.ID projectID, pi.ProjectName projectName, pi.ShortName projectShotName, mi.ID monitorItemID, mi.`Name` monitorItemName, mi.Alias monitorItemAlias, mp.ID monitorPointID, mp.`Name` monitorPointName, mp.GpsLocation gpsLocation, mtf.ID fieldID, mtf.FieldName fieldName, mtf.FieldToken fieldToken FROM tb_warn_threshold_config wtc LEFT JOIN tb_project_info pi ON pi.ID = wtc.ProjectID LEFT JOIN tb_monitor_item mi ON mi.ID = wtc.MonitorItemID LEFT JOIN tb_sensor s ON s.ID = wtc.SensorID LEFT JOIN tb_monitor_point mp ON mp.ID = s.MonitorPointID LEFT JOIN tb_monitor_type_field mtf ON mtf.ID = wtc.FieldID WHERE wtc.ID=#{id}
